title: Internship – Software Test Engineer in Healthcare Solutions
body: Are you seeking an internship where you can apply your skills, learn from experienced professionals, and make a meaningful impact? At Systematic, we develop healthcare software that supports doctors, nurses, and patients every day. As a Software Test Engineer Intern, you will contribute to ensuring that our solutions are reliable and of the highest quality
